Verses: 1 isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Elimaivittup Pirayaanam Panni, Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Randaam Maadham Padhinaindhaam Thedhiyile, Elimukkum Seenaaikkum Naduve Irukkira Seenvanaandharaththil Serndhaargal.
2 andha Vanaandharaththile Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaaga Murumuruththu:

3 naangal Iraichchip Paaththirangalandaiyile Utkaarndhu Appaththaith Thirupthiyaagach Saappitta Egipthu Dhesaththile, Karththarin Kaiyaal Seththupponomaanaal Thaavilai; Indhak Koottam Muzhuvadhaiyum Pattiniyinaal Kollumbadi Neengal Engalaip Purappadappanni, Indha Vanaandharaththile Azhaiththuvandheergale Endru Avargalidaththil Sonnaargal.

4 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Naan Ungalukku Vaanaththilirundhu Appam Varushikkappannuven; Janangal Poi, Ovvoru Naalukku Vendiyadhai Ovvoru Naalilum Serththukkollavendum; Adhinaal Avargal En Niyaayappiramaanaththinbadi Nadappaargalo Nadakkamaattaargalo Endru Avargalaich Sodhippen.
5 aaraam Naalilo, Avargal Naaldhorum Serkkiradhaip Paarkkilum Randaththanaiyaaich Serththu, Adhai Aayaththampanni Vaikkakkadavargal Endraar.
6 appozhudhu Moseyum Aaronum Isravel Puththirar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Karththar Ungalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninavar Enbadhaich Saayangaalaththil Ariveergal;

7 vidiyarkaalaththil Karththarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum Kaanbeergal; Karththarukku Virodhamaana Ungal Murumuruppugalai Avar Kettaar; Neengal Engalukku Virodhamaai Murumurukkiradharku Naangal Emmaaththiram Endraargal.

8 pinnum Mose: Saayangaalaththil Neengal Pusikkiradharkuk Karththar Ungalukku Iraichchiyaiyum, Vidiyarkaalaththil Neengal Thirupthiyadaigiradharku Appaththaiyum Kodukkaiyil Idhu Vilangum; Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Neengal Murumuruththa Ungal Murumuruppugalai Avar Kettaar; Naangal Emmaaththiram? Ungal Murumuruppugal Engalukku Alla, Karththarukke Virodhamaai Irukkiradhu Endraan.
9 appozhudhu Mose Aaronaip Paarththu: Nee Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Serungal, Avar Ungal Murumuruppugalaik Kettaar Endru Sol Endraan.
10 aaron Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaarukkellaam Idhaich Sollugirapodhu, Avargal Vanaandharathisaiyaagath Thirumbippaarththaargal; Appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Magimai Megaththile Kaanappattadhu.
11 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

12 isravel Puththirarin Murumuruppugalaik Kettirukkiren; Nee Avargalode Pesi, Neengal Saayangaalaththil Iraichchiyaip Pusiththu, Vidiyarkaalaththil Appaththaal Thirupthiyaagi, Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Enbadhai Arindhukolveergal Endru Sol Endraar.
13 saayangaalaththil Kaadaigal Vandhu Vizhundhu Paalayaththai Moodikkondadhu. Vidiyarkaalaththil Paalayaththaich Sutri Pani Peydhirundhadhu.
14 peydhirundha Pani Neenginapin, Idho, Vanaandharaththin Meedhengum Urutchiyaana Oru Siriya Vasthu Uraindha Panikkattip Potiyaththanaiyaaith Tharaiyin Mel Kidandhadhu.

15 isravel Puththirar Adhaik Kandu, Adhu Innadhu Endru Ariyaadhirundhu, Oruvarai Oruvar Paarththu, Idhu Enna Endraargal; Appozhudhu Mose Avargalai Nokki: Idhu Karththar Ungalukkup Pusikkakkoduththa Appam.

16 karththar Kattalaiyidugiradhu Ennavendraal, Avaravar Pusikkum Alavukkuth Thakkadhaaga Adhil Eduththuch Serkkakkadaveergal; Ungalilulla Aaththumaakkalin Ilakkaththinbadi, Avanavan Than Than Koodaaraththil Irukkiravargalukkaaga Thalaikku Oru Omar Alavu Eduththukkollakkadavan Endraan.
17 isravel Puththirar Appadiye Seydhu, Silar Migudhiyaayum Silar Konjamaayum Serththaargal.

18 pinbu, Adhai Omaraal Alandhaargal: Migudhiyaaich Serththavanukku Meedhiyaanadhum Illai, Konjamaaich Serththavanukkuk Kuraivaanadhum Illai; Avaravar Thaangal Pusikkum Alavukkuththakkadhaagach Serththaargal.
19 mose Avarkalai Nokki: Oruvanum Vidiyarkaalammattum Adhil Ondrum Vaikkak Koodaadhu Endru Avargalukkuch Solliyum;
20 moseyin Sol Kelaamal, Silar Adhil Vidiyarkaalammattum Konjam Meedhiyaai Vaiththaargal; Adhu Poochchi Pidiththu Naatrameduththadhu. Avargalmel Mose Kobangondaan.
21 adhai Vidiyarkaalandhorum Avaravar Pusikkum Alavukkuththakkadhaagach Serththaargal, Veyil Eraera Adhu Urugippom.
22 aaraam Naalil Thalaikku Irandu Omar Veedhamaaga Irandaththanaiyaai Aagaaram Serththaargal; Appozhudhu Sabaiyin Thalaivar Ellaarum Vandhu, Adhai Mosekku Ariviththaargal.

23 avan Avargalai Nokki: Karththar Sonnadhu Idhudhaan; Naalaikkuk Karththarukkuriya Parisuththa Oivunaalaagiya Oivu; Neengal Sudavendiyadhaich Suttu, Vevikkavendiyadhai Veviththu, Meedhiyaayirukkiradhaiyellaam Naalaimattum Ungalukkaaga Vaiththuvaiyungal Endraan.
24 mose Kattalaiyittabadiye, Adhai Marunaalvaraikkum Vaiththuvaiththaargal; Appozhudhu Adhu Naaravum Illai, Adhile Poochchipidikkavum Illai.
25 appozhudhu Mose: Adhai Indraikkup Pusiyungal; Indru Karththarukkuriya Oivunaal; Indru Neengal Adhai Veliyile Kaanamaatteergal.
26 aarunaalum Adhaich Serppeergalaaga; Ezhaamnaal Oivunaalaayirukkiradhu; Adhile Adhu Undaayiraadhu Endraan.
27 ezhaamnaalil Janangalil Silar Adhaich Serkkap Purappattaargal; Avargal Adhaik Kaanavillai.
28 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: En Kattalaigalaiyum En Piramaanangalaiyum Kaikkolla Endhamattum Manadhillaadhiruppeergal?

29 paarungal, Karththar Ungalukku Oivunaalai Arulinabadiyaal, Avar Ungalukku Aaraam Naalil Irandunaalukku Vendiya Aagaaraththaik Kodukkiraar; Ezhaamnaalil Ungalil Oruvanum Thandhan Sthaanaththilirundhu Purappadaamal, Avanavan Than Than Sthaanaththile Irukkavendum Endraar.
30 appadiye Janangal Ezhaamnaalil Oindhirundhaargal.
31 isravel Vamsaththaar Adharku Mannaa Endru Perittaargal; Adhu Kothdhumalli Alavaayum Venmainiramaayum Irundhadhu, Adhin Rusi Thenitta Panikaaraththirku Oppaayirundhadhu.

32 appozhudhu Mose: Karththar Kattalaiyitta Kaariyam Ennavendraal, Naan Ungalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninapodhu, Vanaandharaththil Ungalukkup Pusikkakkoduththa Appaththai Ungal Sandhadhiyaar Paarkkumbadikku, Avargalukkaaga Adhaik Kaappadharku, Adhile Oru Omar Niraiya Eduththu Vaikkavendum Endraan.
33 melum, Mose Aaronai Nokki: Nee Oru Kalasaththai Eduththu, Adhile Oru Omar Alavu Mannaavaip Pottu, Adhai Ungal Sandhadhiyaarukkaagak Kaappadharkuk Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile Vai Endraan.
34 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Adhu Kaakkappadumbadi Aaron Adhaich Saatchi Sannidhiyil Vaiththaan.
35 isravel Puththirar Kudiyiruppaana Dhesaththukku Varumattum Naarpadhu Varushamalavum Mannaavaip Pusiththaargal; Avargal Kaanaan Dhesaththin Ellaiyil Serum Varaikkum Mannaavaip Pusiththaargal.
36 oru Omaraanadhu Eppaavile Paththil Oru Pangu.
